name: @adobe/commerce-cif-web-action-transformer
description: Adobe Commerce Integration Framework (CIF) Web Action Transformer Project
author: Adobe Systems Inc.

scripts.create-package: wsk -i package create web-action-transformer@$npm_package_version --shared yes; wsk -i package create web-action-transformer@latest --shared yes
scripts.delete-package: wsk -i package delete web-action-transformer@$npm_package_version; wsk -i package delete web-action-transformer@latest
scripts.deploy-package: npm run create-package; npm run deploy; npm run deploy -- --ow-package web-action-transformer@latest
scripts.remove-package: npm run remove; npm run remove -- --ow-package web-action-transformer@latest; npm run delete-package
